gif.alt: A video showing how to assign a value to a variable in Trinket

trinket-assign-var-step-1.step_text: From the variable menu, drag the set variable block to your canvas.
trinket-assign-var-step-1.alt: Shows the procedure for dragging the set variable block to canvas in Trinket

trinket-assign-var-step-2.step_text: Drag the type of value you want to set to the canvas and snap it to the set variable block
trinket-assign-var-step-2.alt: Shows snapping a value block to the set variable block

trinket-assign-var-step-3.step_text: Fill in the value for in the value block by typing in the small box.
trinket-assign-var-step-3.alt: Shows filling in the value in a value block

trinket-assign-var-step-4.step_text: To use the variable, drag the variable block with the connector on the left to your canvas.
trinket-assign-var-step-4.alt: Shows the location of the variable block

trinket-assign-var-step-5.step_text: Snap the variable block into the block you want it to interact with.
trinket-assign-var-step-5.alt: Shows snapping the variable block to a print statement
